incidents.name: Intermittent Failure of Calls to VirtualAgents through Google

incident_updates.body:
Engineers have identified the cause of call failures to VirtualAgent through Google and they continue to work on the fix for agents created from 1 PM PST February 28 through 5 PM PST February 29. Agents created or updated after 5 PM PST February 29, or created before 1 PM PST on February 28 will work as expected.

We expect to provide another update in 16 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

Engineers have identified the cause of call failures to VirtualAgent through Google and are working on a fix for agents created from 1PM PST February 28 through 5PM PST February 29. Agents created or updated after 5PM PST today, or created before 1PM PST on February 28 will work as expected.

We expect to provide another update in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

Engineers have identified the cause of call failures to VirtualAgent through Google and are working on a fix for agents created from 1PM PST February 28 through 5PM PST February 29. Agents created or updated after 5PM PST today, or created before 1PM PST on February 28 will work as expected.

We expect to provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are investigating intermittent failed calls to VirtualAgent through Google. Currently, new VirtualAgents (created after Feb. 28) would return errors. VirtualAgents created prior to the 28th would work as expected.

We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are investigating intermittent failed calls to VirtualAgent through Google. Currently, new VirtualAgents (created after Feb. 28) would return errors. VirtualAgents created prior to the 28th would work as expected.

We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with calls to VirtualAgents through Google. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Twilio Programmable Messaging Service Degraded for Outbound SMS

incident_updates.body: Twilio Programmable Messaging service was degraded for 7 minutes and 50 seconds between 12:06:00 and 12:14:00 UTC on 2024-02-27. During this period, customers may have experienced issue with Outbound SMS status being stuck in SENT status. The issue has now been resolved.
